name: Elements and Wizards
description:
Submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.

Theme:  This is not real.

Game created by:  Tyler Latimer and Randy Becker.

Wizards are hiding their true colors from you, and you must attack them with their corresponding element to defeat them.  Only by standing on the alter can you see their real forms!  Survive as long as you can and defeat as many wizards as possible!
